string.text: The script trader_autoinject.script is out of date. Western Goods comes with an up-to-date one, meaning one of your addons overwrote it. Please arrange your addons so the latest version of that script gets enabled/added last.
Western Goods requires this script to be up-to-date to enable certain trade features.
You can download the latest version from Github : https://github.com/ahuyn/anomaly-dependencies/tree/master/trader_autoinject
Your game has an invalid version or is out-of-date. Please install version S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Anomaly 1.5.2.
Western Goods requires some functionalities added only in 1.5.2, and/or uses prerequisites that themselves require version 1.5.2.
You can download S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Anomaly 1.5.2 from ModDB : https://www.moddb.com/mods/stalker-anomaly/downloads/stalker-anomaly-151-to-152
Barter UI framework is missing. Please install the framework before using Western Goods.
Western Goods requires this framework to enable some features for some special NPCs.
You can download the latest version from Github : https://github.com/ahuyn/anomaly-barter/releases/tag/latest
